response.original_title: Stand UP, Speak OUT: Reproductive Rights - Sterilization
response.overview: A woman who grew up in Puerto Rico talks about the US government's campaign to sterlize women and test birth control pills without informed consent.
response.tagline: A woman talks about involuntary sterilization and contraceptive testing of Puerto Rican women.
response.title: Stand UP, Speak OUT: Reproductive Rights - Sterilization
